com.vk.sdk

Class VKOpenAuthActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.vk.sdk.VKOpenAuthActivity

  • public class VKOpenAuthActivity
extends Activity
    Activity for request OAuth authorization in case of missing VK app.
